name: WSOP Real Money Poker– NJ iPad
name_original: WSOP Real Money Poker– NJ iPad
description:
Download the App to play our holdem tournaments, cash, and casino games. For over 40 years the WORLD SERIES OF POKER has been the most trusted name in poker. It’s all the action and prestige of the World Series of Poker, from the comfort of your own home. At WSOP.com anyone can play and anyone can win. Dreams are dealt on a daily basis. No matter who you are, there’s always a seat waiting for you. We want you to experience the thrill of playing poker and winning cash prizes. We cater to all skill levels from beginners to the Pros. WSOP.com is a regulated, legal gaming site in the state of New Jersey.

Features:
• Licensed and Regulated by NJDGE.org
• 24/7 access to games and customer support
• Easy Deposits and Withdrawals
• Quick access to Texas Hold’em games, Freerolls, Sit & Gos and Multi Table Tournaments
• Lobby filter for easy navigation
• Casino Games such as – Slots, blackjack and more

Find out more about the WSOP and Texas Holdem by visiting our site:
http://www.wsop.com/

Connect with the WSOP on social media:
https://twitter.com/wsopcom
https://www.facebook.com/wsopcom

Must be 21 or older and in the state of New Jersey to play. If you or someone you know has a gambling problem and wants help, call 1-800-GAMBLER.
